def: An apple roasted till black, to be served in a dish of boiledcustard.
German; -- used chiefly of art, literature, etc.
The act of painting or staining, especially of painting theface.

Same as Drought. Sandys.Another ill accident is drouth at the spindling of corn. Bacon.One whose drouth [thirst], Yet scarce allayed, still eyes the currentstream. Milton.In the dust and drouth of London life. Tennyson.
A species of Dorstenia (D. Contrayerva), a South Americanplant, the aromatic root of which is sometimes used in medicine as agentle stimulant and tonic.
The state or quality of being illiberal; narrowness of mind;meanness; niggardliness. Bacon.
A noun suffix having a diminutive force; as in streamlet,armlet.
Quality or state of being transplendent. [R.] Dr. H. More.
The sound made by a bullet in striking a solid object or inpassing through the air.
